metadata.name: Simplicity #5581
metadata.description: Simplicity is a collection of minimalist NFTs featuring basic geometric shapes in various colors. The collection celebrates the beauty of simplicity and the power of minimalism in art. Each NFT in the collection is unique and has been carefully crafted to convey a sense of calm and balance. Each NFT in the collection features geometric shapes, such as a square, circle, or triangle. The shapes are presented on a plain background in a range of colors, from bold primary hues to subtle pastels. Simplicity collection would offer a refreshing break from the often complex and intricate designs of other NFT collections. By celebrating the beauty of simplicity and minimalism, the collection would appeal to art collectors and enthusiasts who appreciate clean, modern design and the power of minimalism in art.
